name: So Much Stuff 2
description:
Sort through a fun way to play hidden object games.



Clear out hidden items and trinkets in a new set of beautifully arranged in themes such as 50s Diners, Groceries, Fancy Jewelry, Science Laboratory, and many more! Enjoy playing a variety of mini-games and collect little trinkets as you go along!



  • Play over 100 games!
  • Downloadable wallpapers
  • Full soundtrack and music player
  • Make gameplay simpler with Help and Hint functions!

Collector's Edition

  • Includes 8 extra themes
  • 18 Downloadable Wallpapers
  • Music player
  • 1 more collection room

So have fun, relax, and sort through so much stuff 2!
